DataCallControl Class Reference
[APOXI Stack Control]

#include <Apoxi/Asc/DataCallControl.hpp>

Detailed Description

This class contains the callback routines called upon arrival of IPDS_SETUP_CNF, IPDS_SETUP_REJ, IPDS_RELEASE_CNF and IPDS_RELEASE_IND. Inherit from this class and overwrite the virtual methods.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void DataCallControl::OnReleaseCompleted (  DcError  error  )  [pure virtual]
 

Invoked upon receipt of the data call release confirmation, or invoked upon receipt of a data call disconnect indication.

Parameters:
error The cause for the disconnection of the data call (if disconnected by network or user remote), NoCallError if invoked due to a preceeding data call release request.

Implemented in CsdDataConn.

virtual void DataCallControl::OnSetupCompleted (  DcError  error  )  [pure virtual]
 

Invoked upon receipt of confirmation or of a data call setup or upon receipt of a rejection of a data call setup attempt.

Parameters:
error The cause for the rejection of the data call setup attempt, NoCallError if the setup was successful.

Implemented in CsdDataConn.
